name: TobiTea
description:
Simple co-op platformer for two players. Really small game made for kids, can be beaten in ten minutes - if you know, what to do. 

Text in Czech, but not required for play. 

Keyboard only, numerical block required. 

Playable only at 16:9 resolution.

Controls:

P1: A, D, Space, E
P2: Left, Right, num 0, num .
